member.name: ITfLanguageProfileNotifySink.OnLanguageChange
member.summary: Called when the language profile is about to change.
member.param: Contains a LANGID value the identifies the new language profile.

Pointer to a BOOL value that receives a flag that permits or prevents the language profile change. Receives zero to prevent the language profile change or nonzero to permit the language profile change.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

member.name: ITfLanguageProfileNotifySink.OnLanguageChanged
member.summary: Called after the language profile has changed.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: The ITfLanguageProfileNotifySink interface is implemented by an application to receive notifications when the language profile changes.
To install this advise sink, obtain an object from an object by calling ITfInputProcessorProfiles.QueryInterface with IID_ITfSource. Then call with IID_ITfLanguageProfileNotifySink.
